amendment.description: To appropriate funds for a Cuba Fund for a Democratic Future to promote democratic transition in Cuba.

action.text: Amendment SA 4853 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4853.
Amendment SA 4853 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S8698-8699; text: CR S8698) To appropriate funds for a Cuba Fund for a Democratic Future to promote democratic transition in Cuba.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4853 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
